alert.note: Alert for Kennebec (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 21 at 2:17PM EST until December 21 at 8:34PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Maine... Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire...Maine... Lamprey River Near Newmarket affecting Strafford and Rockingham Counties. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Maine...New Hampshire... Androscoggin River At Gorham affecting Coos and Oxford Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Kennebec River at Augusta. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Water begins to flood parking lots on Front Street in Augusta. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM EST Thursday the stage was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling through the weekend. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
